defs: = ಕಕ್ಕುಲತೆ.
a covetous, greedy man.
a man of compassion or warm feeling towards another.

its berry.

tending to keep its form rather than to flow or spread out like a liquid or gas; solid.

a small crane (Anthropoides virgo) of Africa and Asia, demoiselle.

the bird Perdix oculea.
the red-billed quail, Coturnix erythrohyncha.
the hollow beneath the junction of the arm and shoulder; the armpit; the axilla.

a space within a building enclosed by walls or separated from other similar spaces by walls or partitions; a room.

a single long cloth used to cover the privy parts, as by a male ascetic or, poormen in warm climates; a loin cloth.

the women's quarters in a palace; the harem.

a space enclosed by walls, adjoining or in a castle or other large building; a courtyard.
a place for entering; door, gate, etc.; an entrance.
orbit a) the actual or imaginary path taken by a celestial body during its periodic revolution around another body; b) the path taken by an artificial satellite or spacecraft around a celestial body.
a man who is very close to another (at latteṛs service, command etc.).
a bag with a long handle as to facilitate it to be carried by hanging on one's shoulder; a side-bag.

a single long cloth used to cover the privy parts, as by a male ascetic or, poor men in warm climates; a loin cloth.

an action to secure justice in a court of law; a law suit.
(masc.) a person who requests, petitions or entreats; a plaintiff or petitioner in a lawsuit; a suitor.
(masc.) a person or company for whom a lawyer, accountant, advertising agency, etc. is acting; a client.
3) the territorial range of authority; jurisdiction; 2. a part of a building enclosed by walls or partitions, floor and ceiling; a room.
an arrow having prong-like points.
a court or enclosure adjacent to a building (as a house or palace); a courtyard.
a change in or changing of, the orbit of a celestial body or an artificial satellite.
the extent, total space of an inner apartment.
a band put around the belly of an elephant or horse for holding a saddle, pack, etc.; the girth.
a space enclosed by walls (within a large house).
the point, line or edge where something ends or must end; boundary or border beyond which something ceases to be or to be possible.
useless - a) having no use; unserviceable; worthless; b) to no purpose; ineffectual; of no avail.
a boring account of something; a narration that is uninteresting.
an uncivilised, rude person.
a thing that is useless or worthless.
ಕಗ್ಗ ಹೊಸೆ kagga hose to narrate in a very boring manner.

a weapon for cutting and thrusting, consisting of a hilt with a cross-guard and a long straight or curved blade with a sharp point, later often worn on ceremonial occasions as a symbol of honour, authority or of religion; a sword.
a net, used like a bag, for holding materials to be carried or conveyed.
a knot that cannot be easily untied.

a knot that is tied very fast.

(fig.) to rouse a pleasant feeling by being comical or huorous.

ಕಚ್ಚಾಕರಡು kaccā karaḍu a resolution, accounts, statement, etc. in its preliminary stage or rough form; ಕಚ್ಚಾಕಿರ್ದಿ kaccā kirdi (book keping) amount pending allocation to respective accounts; ಕಚ್ಚಾಪದಾರ್ಥ kaccā padārtha = ಕಚ್ಚಾಮಾಲು; ಕಚ್ಚಾಮಣ kaccā maṇa an old measure of weight; ಕಚ್ಚಾಮಾಲು kaccā mālu material still in its natural or original state, before being processed or manufacture of a new product; ; a raw material; ಕಚ್ಚಾರಸ್ತೆ kaccā raste a road that is not constructed completely or perfectly; a mud-road; ಕಚ್ಚಾವಸ್ತು kaccā vastu = ಕಚ್ಚಾಮಾಲು; ಕಚ್ಚಾಸೇರು kaccā sēru any of more than one erstwhile units of weight; ಕಚ್ಚಾಹುರಿ kaccā huri semifinished, untrimmed rope.
crude iron tapped from a blast furnace and cast into pigs in preparation for conversion into steel, cast iron or wrought iron.

(fig.) to inflict pain; to cause another suffer pain.
to stick to; to get fastened to; to fit properly or tightly.

a quarrel - a) a dispute or disagreement, esp. one marked by anger and deep resentment; b) a falling out; breaking up of friendly relations.

the building, room or series of rooms in which the affairs of a business, professional person, branch of government, etc. are carried on; an office.
